availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Marshall Harbeson (Fleming County, Kentucky, court clerk)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamen Harbeson and Mary Harbeson. Married to Frances A. Metcalfe Harbeson on August 28, 1856 in Mason County, Kentucky. Father of Circuit Court clerk in Fleming County, Kentucky, in 1860. Appears on the rolls of the Consolidated List of Civil War Draft Registrations in the Ninth District of Kentucky, in September 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 797.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281846, p. 293.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Ninth Congressional District, KY, May 1865, NAI: 4213514; Archive Volume Number: 1 of 3, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
